execution_quality: Good execution of the initial request with proper file modifications, but the follow-up indicates the agent may not have fully anticipated the architectural incompatibility between subcommands and positional arguments.
work_category: CLI interface refactoring to change default command behavior and add flag-based options for daemon mode and directory specification.
summary: The agent successfully implemented the initial ergonomics request to make service the default command and -i the default with a -d/--daemon flag. However, the implementation created an architectural problem where subcommands became incompatible with the positional directory argument, requiring user correction and follow-up work to redesign the directory parameter as a flag instead.
follow_up_pattern: User identified a design issue with the implementation and requested a fix to use a flag instead of positional arguments for the directory parameter.
